designIntent.purpose: User type definition and creation utility
keyDecisions: Uses TypeScript interfaces for type safety
designIntent.rationale: Centralized user creation ensures consistent user objects across the application

assumptions.text: User props are validated before reaching this function
Email format is pre-validated by form validation

constraints.text: Must maintain backward compatibility with existing UserProps interface
constraints.reason: Used in 15+ components across the application

tradeoffs.shortcut: Using Date() directly instead of a date library
tradeoffs.repaymentPlan: Consider date-fns if timezone handling is needed

frozenSections.reason: Public API - changing signature breaks all consumers
frozenSections.exceptions: Adding optional properties with defaults only
